jobDescription: Job Details:The eGRC Data Analyst will be responsible for ensuring data quality standards are met to achieve the organization’s vision for the eGRC platform, RSA Archer. This individual will review various datasets within Archer to ensure data is complete, accurate and valid. Additional responsibilities include, but not limited to analyzing and performing trend analysis to identify potential errors within Archer and identify data enhancements to mature and provide assurance for management reporting. Maintain data quality standards through various data analytic procedures.Extract and collect data from various modules within Archer for analysis.Parse and review Archer data which includes, but are not limited to datasets from authoritative bodies, such as the SEC, widely recognize risk and control frameworks, organizational policies and procedures as well as the risks and control activities.Mine and analyze datasets to identify incomplete or inaccurate records to remediate upon.Perform root cause analysis and prepare action plans for the remediation effort.Create reports to help detect data exceptions which may adversely impact the system and usability for end users.Identify data trends and key metrics to enhance the data model for reporting.Develop and maintain various reports for internal and external end users.Provide support on special projects as needed by the ERM leadership team.
